Package com.illcode.meterman

The system package for Meterman, containing essential interfaces and utility classes.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Entity
    A class representing a world entity (i.e.
    Game
    An instance of a particular game.
    MetermanGameGlue
    The interface used in the discovery of GameS which will be integrated into the Meterman system and shown in the "New Game" list.
    Persistence
    Implementations of this interface are responsible for serializing and deserializing WorldState instances to and from streams.
    Room  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Attributes
    The system attribute constants used with the Entity and Room attribute methods
    GameManager  
    GamesList
    A class containing the names of all the games packaged with Meterman, and a method to retrieve a Game instance based on a given name.
    GameUtils
    Utility methods that apply to the game world or interface.
    KryoPersistence
    Uses Kryo to serialize world state.
    Meterman  
    Player
    The player character
    SystemActions  
    TextBundle
    A TextBundle is a container for named text passages, also supporting variable subtitution, and parent bundle chaining.
    Utils  
    WorldState
    A class representing the entire state of the game world.

Package com.illcode.meterman Description

The system package for Meterman, containing essential interfaces and utility classes.
